ygData.subject: Re: WnS
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Werewolf either drops Lupine Armbands (don t need to do anything, they just work), Pelt (Take it to Karg with 100pp and you get a lupine cloak), or claws
ygData.messageBody:
>Ok, so do they drop skin? How do you end up getting lupine armor? I was
>assuming they'd drop a pelt or skin and you could take it to certain
>vendors, like Karg (heck of a walk though). If so, how expensive is it to
>have him make it? Heard the claws were 75pp?

Werewolf either drops Lupine Armbands (don't need to do anything, they just
work), Pelt (Take it to Karg with 100pp and you get a lupine cloak), or
claws (Take it to Karg with 75pp and you get lupine gauntlets), or nothing
at all (yuck). The named werewolf drops a lupine tunic.

Sandeep
